attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask for anomalies like this not to occur any more. It is a resubmission of a petition which has been rejected.

rejection.details:
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.

Please resubmit, removing any names of individuals.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
